怓字的基本解释

怓
náo
乱：“无纵诡随，以谨惛怓。”

怓
niú
愁。

怓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［náo］
［《廣韻》女交切，平肴，娘。］
(1)见“惛怓”、“怓怓”。
(2)心乱。

怓字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　怓； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页380第11
【唐韻】女交切【集韻】【正韻】尼交切，?音鐃。【說文】亂也。　又【韻會】泥交切，音鐃。義同。　又叶尼?切，音㖻。【詩·大雅】無縱詭隨，以謹惽怓。式遏?虐，無俾民憂。◎按《說文》玉篇廣韻集韻類篇正韻皆切孃母，而韻會獨切泥母，然泥母不如孃母之親也。泥孃二母，徵音旣同，次濁又同，最易相犯。然泥母，舌動而音在舌端。孃母，舌靜而音在舌上。二母雖次濁，泥輕而孃尤輕。如怓字，女交切，音鐃。其音在舌上，則孃母切鐃音爲親矣。凡泥孃二母當淸者，倣此。

怓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
怓字的起名意思

暂无。

[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　怓; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 380 to 11
[Tang Yun] Female cross cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Ni cross cut,? Sound. [Said Wen] Chaos too.　[Rhyme Club] The mud crosses, and the sound is played. The same meaning.　 Yeni again? Cut, sound. 【Poetry·Daya】Follow without indifference, with caution. The style of curbing abuse, there is no worries for the people. ◎According to "Shuowen", the positive rhymes of the Yupian Guangyun Jiyun chapters all cut the mother's mother, and the rhyme will cut the mud mother alone, but the mother's mother is not as good as the mother's relative. The two mothers of the mud niang have the same voice, but the second voice is the same, and they are the most likely to commit each other. However, the tongue moves and the sound is at the end of the tongue. Mother, the tongue is quiet and the sound is on the tongue. Although the second mother is turbid, the mud is light and the mother is especially light. Such as the character of Zan, the female cross-cut, and the sound. If the sound is on the tongue, the mother-in-law cuts the sound as close. The second mother of the mud niang is like this.
